text:
If a proxy has to be used to connect the backend server this could be configured
by the ProxyRemote config item. But if this proxy requires an authentication
there is no way to configure this. To solve this problem I wrote a patch for the
httpd-2.0.55 server (bug 37355). This patch adds a new feature to the
ProxyRemote config item:

   ProxyRemote <scheme>://<host> http://[<login>:<password>@]<proxyhost>:<port>

This feature would be nice to have in any further versions of the httpd server.
